title: Korean film almost mirrors present day politics at Cannes
text:
Korean film almost mirrors present day politics at Cannes 8:44pm BST - 02:08
''The Spy Gone North'' about a South Korean spy who infiltrated North Korea in the 1990s could almost be today's news, as efforts to resolve the nuclear stand-off face a real-life cliffhanger. Jayson Mansaray reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
"The Spy Gone North" about a South Korean spy who infiltrated North Korea in the 1990s could almost be today's news, as efforts to resolve the nuclear stand-off face a real-life cliffhanger. Jayson Mansaray reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2L8YRTI
